title: 46: OBITCH drill me already...
description:
Oh Geoff’s, you are in for a real treat this week as we discuss the wild practice of trepanation, and some horrifying stories involving body brokers…we’ll explain. We’ve got an obituary that left us with some questions, and one for a real monster-in-law. Oh, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminals! LET’S GO! 
Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Prose: Go to prose.com/obit for a free in-depth hair consultation + 15% off! 
Apostrophe: Visit apostrophe.com/obit and use code ‘OBIT’ to save $15 off your first visit. 
Skylight Frame: To save $10 just visit skylightframe.com and enter code ‘OBITS’ at checkout. 
Athena Club: Use promo code ‘OBIT’ for 20% off at athenaclub.com

Sources: https://thereader.mitpress.mit.edu/hole-in-the-head-trepanation/ https://www.medicinenet.com/what_is_the_purpose_of_trepanation/article.htm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trepanning https://www.forbes.com/sites/amandasiebert/2021/06/15/queen-of-the-psychedelic-renaissance-amanda-feilding-has-been-committed-to-cognitive-liberty-for-55-years/?sh=50a1e48658bf https://www.vice.com/en/article/bnj4qv/drilling-a-hole-in-your-head-for-a-higher-state-of-consciousness https://www.southwestledger.news/news/hospital-ceo-fired-over-sexual-issues?fbclid=IwAR3sUhVs1qfZh8hRedqWaQDA82MCbJaBOjvf28cvI8UILRB0NTfOnQbTonc https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1DZjJCLkhA0 https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/eveningsun/name/carole-roberson-obituary?id=20998168 https://brownpoliticalreview.org/2018/11/merchants-death-thriving-unregulated-body-brokerage-industry/ https://allthatsinteresting.com/best-all-that-is-interesting-articles https://psmag.com/magazine/arms-dealers https://www.eastidahonews.com/2022/04/woman-arrested-for-allegedly-driving-into-parked-vehicle-because-she-wanted-to-ruin-it/?fbclid=IwAR0vM3hSuQn6tJFjpoir6QjpOJ6ymE9uaduy0qEqZzPHrX415VL32J8v5L8

Oh Geoff’s, you are in for a real treat this week as we discuss the wild practice of trepanation, and some horrifying stories involving body brokers…we’ll explain. We’ve got an obituary that left us with some questions, and one for a real monster-in-law. Oh, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminals! LET’S GO! 
Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
